path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Verichains_Lab/Verichains Public Audit Report - World of Defish Token Vesting - v1.1.pdf

findings.title: Possible issue when using third party token contract
findings.description: Contract uses transfer and transferFrom to send/receive tokens without requiring reverts on failure, which may lead to issues with third-party token contracts, including potential reentrancy attacks.
findings.contract: World of Defish Coin Vesting Smart Contract
